title: Casual Game Acoustic Guitar Pack
description: Positive and relaxing, looping background music (4 tracks with 5-6 variations of each!), along with 3 SFX. Created to accompany games that require fun, calm, and casual feel to them.
longDescription:
This music pack was created with casual games in mind! The choice of bright, acoustic instruments, was made to deliver that positive and relaxing feel for your next game project. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay, or in the main menu of a puzzle, farming simulation, arcade, drawing, or any kind of casual and easy-going game! Of course, this pack is suitable for wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.


  • This pack is available in our affordable bundle: Casual Game Music Bundle 1
  • This pack is a part of our affordable 'Kids Game SFX & Music' bundle!
technicalDetails:
